note.p: Anthropologist. One of the first women to join the Anthropological Society of Great Britain and Ireland after membership was opened to women in 1875. Published a collection of essays, Anthropological studies (1891). Awarded a civil list pension a few years before her death.
Journal of the Anthropological Institute of Great Britain and Ireland 28 (1899): 325–6
Wiltshire, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1916 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 May 2020)
